metadata.title: CVE-2024-56161 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper signature verification in AMD CPU ROM microcode patch loader mayallow an attacker with local administrator privilege to load malicious CPUmicrocode resulting in loss of confidentiality and integrity of aconfidential guest running under AMD SEV-SNP.

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
